attributes.description: Get the exclusions configured in Microsoft Windows Defender and their details.
attributes.query:
select name, regex_match(r.key, '[^\\]\w+$', 0) as ExclusionType, key, datetime(mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ModificationTimeUTC from registry r where
r.key == 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions\\Extensions' or
r.key == 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions\\IpAddresses' or
r.key == 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions\\Paths' or
r.key == 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions\\Processes' or
r.key == 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions\\TemporaryPaths'
